title: uche6215
author: uche6215
content: My name is Uche and I was born in the year 1990, am from the family of 3 we are 2 boys and a girl. While I was 5yrs old my father died in a car accident trying to provide the family needs. When my dad died things was so difficult for us, I was little then and I couldn't assist. My mom have to sell the little property we have so we can go to school, then I realized life is so complicated, no body to call unto for help, selling the little thing we have can't even afford the price of our school fees. In the year 2008 when I was 18yrs old I decided to quit school so my younger ones can continue, then I have to hustle more harder, it got to a point that my mom was so sick and she need to go to the hospitalüè• but no money then I was so disappointed it ¬†got to a point that I was about to join bad gangs but I didn't join. The only thing that give hope was that my younger one's are in school one day things will change for good.In the year 2012 my father's younger brother, Uncle Frank who lives at England came back home, he visited us and ask for his elder brother and we told him how it happens, he felt pity on us, after some days he called all of us he sponsored my younger brother in school at England, help my sister in the university and me too, also a business for my mother. While I was in school someone introduced forex trading to me but I wasn't interested in forex trading but letter told me about buying Bitcoin at low price rate and sell at high price and he also introduced me to this forum (Bitcointalk)And That's how I joined this forum.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: I'm sorry for the hard times and your sad story bro uche, it's really touching, I'm sorry sorry the the dead of your dad, may his soul rest in peace, I so much thank God for answering your prayers and sending Uncle Frank to your aid, all glory to God for the later liberation of your family..Uche you are welcome to this forum, I believe everyone is open minded here, feel free to ask questions where you don't understand, members will be willing to answer to you..You are welcome

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: According to G. Michael Hopf, "Hard times create strong men. Strong men create good times. Good times create weak men. And, weak men create hard times.¬† OP, I think I have read a similar story before in a novel, but all the same, a lot of people did not make it on a plate of gold. The truth is that some people passed through a very difficult experience and labored very hard for a very long time before they could enjoy the fruits of their labor. You lost your dad; I'm sorry about that. You also have a good heart to have agreed to drop school for your younger ones to continue. I'm glad your uncle's help was worth it and you were able to share your story here.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Life is not a bed or¬† Roses, sometimes it get hard and sometimes it turns to be in our favour. You are in the right place to learn on bitcoin and its blockchain technology, so feel free to ask any question that is troubling you and you will get answers ASAP. You should take your time to learn by reading other forum members thread and make research on your own with google.Welcome to the forum.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.created_time: February 14, 2023, 11:50:30 PMLast edit: February 15, 2023, 06:46:33 AM by Broadanbig
comments.body: So sorry that you had to go through all the experience in life while growing up as a child. I could see your childhood days was hell due to the demise of your father. I would tell you something, every great man you have heard about passed through one challenge or the other and all this was a preparatory for them ahead of their task. Only God knows why you passed through that experience but I strongly believe you are stronger than you were while growing up as a child. ¬†But in all, you have to improve better so as to grow higher than you are now. Be strong and courageous mate. You will get there someday.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: You are welcome here. Everyone has a story to tell, and there is always someone who has it worse than us. Whatever your goal is on the forum and in life, you will achieve it as long as you nor "lose guard yourself". Focus on making relevant, high-quality posts that share knowledge, offer new insights, or show that you truly want to learn. In no time, you will see yourself rise through the ranks. I wish you all the best.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: I was sad reading the first part of your story but thank God your story has a happy ending. God will make the joy around you a permanent one. Alot of people have worse stories than what you have passed through and most times no one comes to help, even family members. But come your dad's younger brother did not know his brother passed away? Was he not communicating with you people until he cane back from abroad? Life is not fair and this is why those who have currently should not boast because they have and think others do not have because it is their sins that is preventing God from blessing them.
